trans-unit.source: Controls how a document is printed, when printing from a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: Controlla come viene stampato un documento, in caso di stampa da un'applicazione Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> controls how a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> is printed.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene implementato in una classe derivata, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> controlli come un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> viene stampato.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> invokes the print controller's <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> methods, which in turn tell the printer how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> richiama il controller di stampa <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>, e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> metodi, che a sua volta informazioni della stampante stampare il documento.

trans-unit.source: Print preview uses a specialized <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.
trans-unit.target: Anteprima di stampa utilizza un specializzato <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.

trans-unit.source: For an example of a print controller that is specialized for print preview, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>.
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio di un controller di stampa specializzato per l'anteprima di stampa, vedere il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> is used by <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, and not typically used directly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> viene utilizzato da <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>e in genere non viene utilizzato direttamente.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework includes three print controllers that are derived from <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> that help accomplish common tasks.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework include tre controller di stampa che derivano da <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> che consentono di eseguire attivit√† comuni.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController> prints a document to a printer.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController> stampa un documento a una stampante.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController> generates a preview of what the document will look like when printed and is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> classes.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController> genera un'anteprima dell'aspetto del documento stampato e viene utilizzato il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> classi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> provides a printing status dialog during the printing process.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> fornisce una finestra di dialogo di stato durante il processo di stampa.

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla stampa con Windows Form, vedere il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> panoramica dello spazio dei nomi.

trans-unit.source: If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Se si desidera stampare da un'applicazione Windows Presentation Foundation, vedere il <xref:System.Printing> dello spazio dei nomi.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" />.

trans-unit.source: for safe printing from a restricted dialog box.
trans-unit.target: per la stampa protetta da una finestra di dialogo ridotta.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione associata: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" /> is used for print preview.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" /> viene utilizzata per l'anteprima di stampa.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> che rappresenta il documento in corso di stampa.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, completa la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come verr√† stampata una pagina di un documento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> viene chiamato immediatamente dopo il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento.

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> is not called.
trans-unit.target: Se viene generata un'eccezione all'interno di un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento di un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> non viene chiamato.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> Crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> che viene inviato alla stampante.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> metodo imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> su un'immagine di una singola pagina.

trans-unit.source: (Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: (Utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> metodo per impostare la modalit√† stampare una pagina in un documento.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.) The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, √® possibile modificare le impostazioni di pagina separatamente per ogni pagina.) Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mentre il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> metodo la deallocazione.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> che rappresenta il documento in corso di stampa.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, completa la sequenza di controllo che determina come e quando verr√† stampato un documento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> viene chiamato immediatamente dopo il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> Crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> che viene inviato alla stampante.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> metodo imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> su un'immagine di una singola pagina.

trans-unit.source: (Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> method to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: (Utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> metodo per determinare quando e come stampare un documento.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.) The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, √® possibile ritardare la stampa di 30 minuti o modificare le impostazioni della stampante per il documento.) Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mentre il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> metodo la deallocazione.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> che rappresenta il documento in corso di stampa.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, avvia la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come verr√† stampata una pagina di un documento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> that represents a page from a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> che rappresenta una pagina da un <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> is called immediately before the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> viene chiamato immediatamente prima di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> Crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> che viene inviato alla stampante.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> metodo imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> su un'immagine di una singola pagina.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mentre il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> metodo la deallocazione.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> metodo per impostare la modalit√† stampare una pagina in un documento.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, √® possibile regolare le impostazioni di pagina separatamente per ogni pagina.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> che rappresenta il documento in corso di stampa.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, avvia la sequenza di controllo che determina come e quando verr√† stampato un documento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> viene chiamato immediatamente dopo il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> evento.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> method to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> metodo per determinare quando e come stampare un documento.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, √® possibile ritardare la stampa di 30 minuti o modificare le impostazioni della stampante per il documento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> Crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> che viene inviato alla stampante.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to one of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> metodo imposta il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> a uno di una singola pagina.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mentre il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> metodo la deallocazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> method is a good place to verify that <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> are valid.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> metodo √® un ottimo strumento per verificare che <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> sono validi.
